Title: Erratum: Is arthroscopy of the knee completely useless? Meta-analysis: a reviewer’s nightmare(Bone Joint J (2015) 97 (1591–1592) DOI: 10.1302/0301-620X.97B12.37456)
Abstract: ©2016 The British Editorial Society of Bone & Joint SurgeryBollen SR. Is arthroscopy of the knee completely useless? Meta-analysis: a reviewer’s nightmare. Bone Joint J 2015;97-B:1591–1592. We regret that the address provided for Mr Bollen was incorrect. The correct address is: The Yorkshire Clinic, Bradford Road, Bingley, West Yorkshire, United Kingdom. Zaidi R, Cro S, Gurusamy K, Sivanadarajah N, Macgregor A, Henricson A, Goldberg A. The outcome of total ankle replacement: a systematic review and meta-analysis. Bone Joint J 2013;95-B:1500–1507. We regret that the name of one of the authors was published incorrectly. The correct version is printed above.
